resources.title: Squoosh
resources.description: Squoosh is the ultimate image optimizer that allows you to compress and compare images with different codecs in your browser.

resources.title: TinyPNG
resources.description: Free online image compressor for faster websites! Reduce the file size of your WEBP, JPEG, and PNG images with TinyPNG’s smart lossy compression engine.

resources.title: Dark Reader
resources.description: Dark mode on all websites. Care your eyes, use Dark Reader for night and daily browsing. For Chrome and Firefox, Edge and Safari.

resources.title: SVG Repo
resources.description: Free Vectors and Icons in SVG format. ✅ Download free mono or multi color vectors for commercial use. Search in 500.000+ Free SVG Vectors and Icons.

resources.title: Coolors
resources.description: Generate or browse beautiful color combinations for your designs.

resources.title: Exercism
resources.description: Learn, practice and get world-class mentoring in over 50 languages. 100% free.

resources.title: HackerRank
resources.description: HackerRank is the market-leading coding test and interview solution for hiring developers. Start hiring at the pace of innovation!

resources.title: codi.link | HTML, CSS, JavaScript Live Editor Playground
resources.description: codi.link is a live editor for HTML, CSS and JS. Edit your code in real-time, and see the result instantly

resources.title: Excalidraw | Hand-drawn look & feel • Collaborative • Secure
resources.description: Excalidraw is a virtual collaborative whiteboard tool that lets you easily sketch diagrams that have a hand-drawn feel to them.

resources.title: Error Lens
resources.description: Extension for Visual Studio Code - Improve highlighting of errors, warnings and other language diagnostics.

resources.title: Tailwind CSS Cheat Sheet
resources.description: Find quickly all the class names and CSS properties with this interactive cheat sheet. The only Tailwind CheatSheet you will ever need!
A tool to help generate color shades for Tailwind CSS.
Generate, edit, save and share Tailwind CSS color shades based on a given hexcode or HSL color.

resources.title: AI Image Upscaler: Upscale Images & Photos Online
resources.description: Software de escalado inteligente online gratuito para mejorar calidad de fotos e imágenes (JPG, PNG). Aumentar calidad de imagen automáticamente usando IA.

resources.title: Heroicons
resources.description: Beautiful hand-crafted SVG icons, by the makers of Tailwind CSS.

resources.title: Fontsource
resources.description: Download and self-host Open Source fonts in neatly bundled NPM packages.
